description.de-DE: Mit Mollie integrieren Sie alle wichtigen internationalen und lokalen Zahlungsmethoden in nur einem Schritt in Ihren Shopware-Webshop. Starten Sie noch heute!
description.en-GB: With Mollie you integrate every major global and local payment method in your Shopware webshop in one go. Start growing your business with effortless payments today!
description.nl-NL: Met Mollie integreer je alle belangrijke internationale en lokale betaalmethoden in één keer in je Shopware webshop. Start vandaag nog!

suggest.shopware/storefront: Require '*'. Enables features like Creditcard Components and iDeal issuer selector.
suggest.shopware/administration: Require '*'. Enables features like partial shipping and refunding.
